title: Game can not connect after champion select.
body:
After champion select when it brings up all the players before the match begins it black screens, waits a min or so then pops up saying that it failed to connect and asks if I want to try and reconnect.

What I have tried so far to fix it:
Restarted computer x 2
clicked reconnect over and over again.
clicked don't connect then tried reconnecting
closed league, reopened it, and tried reconnecting to the game
turned off firewall.
Ran the HexTech repair tool
Force re-patch of game.

What I am currently trying:
No Idea....

- Edit -  Force Re-Patching seems to have worked. If I run into the issue again ill update.
- Second Edit - Force Re-Patching worked for 1 match... Problem still persists.
- Annnnd now i have been placed in priority queue because it fails to let me join the game... thanks rito....

replies.body: Black screen issues like this are usually due to network problems failing to establish a connection to the game server and download assets.  A more permanent fix can be found by going through each step of our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  The instructions there should get you squared away and back in game!
